articles.title: EU proposes ban on Russian oil imports this year. Hungary says no - CNN
articles.description: The European Union is proposing to ban all oil imports from Russia by the end of this year and remove the country's biggest bank, Sberbank, from the SWIFT international payments network.

articles.title: NASA sends warning as 'strong' solar flare batters Earth – Europe hit with ‘blackouts’ - Express
